content.detailedDescription:
Me and my son came home early from the 4th of july in n. andover, ma.  because my youngest  son was 1 1/2, and other 6.  we were watching the fire works out side the window.    and a lite went up and stop and i said to my son do you see that and it kept coming closer to our apt, when it go close i open the screen and it was a large grey ship. and it was making a large humming noise.  i ran to the back porch and it was over the house with that noise , in which i will never forget.  and i went back inside grab my baby and called my mother & son huddle and called  her back.  she said if you saw someone did., but no one was around.  and to this day the older remembers and will never forget. he id 32.  and i saw again in that area early.]
  \\\
content.summary: Humming and grey with lights all around it

content.detailedDescription:
When i was a young teenager my friend and i was 
riding our bicycles at the top of the lane where 
i had lived. we were on the road when something
caught my eye i looked up and couldn't believe what
i was seeing. i yelled to my friend to check it out 
it was a giant triangle shaped object with lights
on it i'm guessing it was the size of three or four
blimps put together at the largest end and maybe
five or six hundred feet off the ground.It had no sound that
i can recall and was moveing at a crawl.It went
directly over top of us and was heading across a field 
my friend and i wanted to chase it so we started down
the road to go around the block to the next street.
that is all i can recall. through the years i allways
remembered what i saw but not that my friend was
with me.Years later i was telling my friend about it
and that some one was with me but couldnt remember
who when he said it was him  but he too couldnt
remember who was with him . that is all either of
us remember. i'm not suggesting that we were 
abducted or anything but it is quite strange.
at the time i had seen the object i had always
thought ufo's were supposed to be saucer shaped
that just isn't true. i know i seen something  
that day and i do not believe it was of this earth!
content.summary: Two friends see strange object

content.detailedDescription:
returning from a trip from new york city in my car to waterloo ny at about 3 am as i turned north on my home street, carlton road ,i was shocked to see a high intensity white light flight ignite and move horizontally with unbelievable acceleration.I queried
     
 rome air development center the next morning if they may have been testing phosphorous missiles in horizontal flight near waterloo ny receiving a negative reply. the flash occured at about 10 degrees above the horizon at an estimated range of 1 to 10 miles. a tremendous amount of high frequency energy would be required for such acceleration if a significant amount of mass was involved..
content.summary: Blinding flash then horizontal flight of extremely bright ball of white light moving with unbelievable acceleration.

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were driving home one night from madras, oregon, around 9:30 pm. we were driving south towards home and i looked over her side and out the window and noticed a large object with lights following us, just right about the power lines. the object was mostly these large lights and when it turned the lights seemed to reposistion themselves. not like a plane where they would be in the same position even when turning. then we slowed then turned west, off on a side road, because my lights had gone out on my car all of the sudden, and when i did that, the object then  slowed and turned with us. i went ahead about 200 feet and came to a complete stop. i noticed the object had stopped as well. we rolled the windows down and noticed there was no sound what so ever. my sister and i were both saying that this was just strange because there should be some sound coming from something that large. the next thing i remember starting my car back up and driving ahead and then the object slowly moved over the top of us. then it slowly moved down the road and went straight up the side of a butte (pronounced bewt, this is a large hill) and shot straight up into the sky so fast it just dissappeared. my sister and i arrived home 2 hours later and my father was upset, asking why we got home so late, i was thinking it wasn't that late until i looked at the clock and noticed the time. what should've taken us 15 minutes, took us 2 hours to get home. my sister and i to this day only tell close friends and i have told work mates and only people i know that won't judge me. to this day i have woke up with marks on my body and even holes in my tongue that were bleeding with no pain present, all of which i cannot explain. my youngest sister lives in arizona were there is no grass and has woke up with grass in her hand and strange bruises and marks on her body also that cannot be explained. we both have had dreams and been able to finish the others dream because we seem to have the same dreams. not by coincidence.
content.summary: A triangular shape with lights followed my sister and i a short distance from my car

content.detailedDescription: In two separate instances, my husband and i were traveling by car together down a road in the small rural community of hillsborough, nc at night, and saw what appeared to be a green florescent liquid falling straight down from the sky. it fell from the sky directly to our right (passenger side of car) in both instances. the originating point was well above the trees yet did not appear to be falling from a great height. it did not have the projectory of a comet, but came straight to the earth, as if falling from something invisible overhead. it stunned us and we tried to find a reason to think it was a comet; yet it did not fall like a comet. at the second sighting, a week or two later in the same vicinity but a different location, two streams fell at the same time - one shorter than the other but falling side by side. we both agree that we saw a thick, florescing, molten-like liquid, that appeared to dissipate just before hitting the ground. we are familiar with the area and know there are no power lines or anything else overhead in both locations.  it appeared to be totally silent, however, we did not exit the car at any time to investigate. it happened so fast the first time that we really didn't know what to think of it. if i had been alone and only seen it once, i think i would have thougnt it was my imagination!! the second time we were just speechless. we have not been able to come up with a rational explanation for what we saw. we have thought a lot about it since it happened. again, it absolutely appeared to be coming from an invisible source way above the trees and not just free falling from space, and we both saw it twice.
content.summary: Streams of green flourescent substance falling from the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: It was daytime and clear. i was standing on carroll street in brooklyn ny where it intersects with 5th avenue. the object was heading in about the same direction as carroll street when looking towards prospect park. the object was a white ball above the clouds as my view would be lost as it passed above the clouds. the obsevation lasted about 20 seconds in which time the object moved from overhead to the limit of my horizon. the object was very high and no shape was observable. there was no contrail. i was very accustomed to seeing aircraft over nyc and this was nothing like that in terms of speed. i have military experience and have taken flying lessons as well. i called public relations at nasa afterwards to ask if it could be the space station or another artificial object but they said nothing would be viewable during the day and "i suggest you call the air force". the year indicated may be plus or minus one. should have reported it to you folks earlier.
content.summary: White ball high above cloud cover moving at enormous speed

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were leaving her house to go to my parents.For some reason i looked westand saw this thing i thought was a helicopter, but after opening the window it wasnt.I freaked out and told alexandrine to look over her shoulder. the beam ceased and it was as if it had known i was looking at it. as soon as the light turned green i told her to "go!". as we left speeding it turned in the air and made a slow glide toward our direction. i had her take all kinds of turns through the upper blocks to try to get away.Upon realizing at what we saw we sat on the flat roof of the apartment and waited for it.At one point of the watch we saw something silent , but it soon dissappeared behind the tree.I have not seen it ever since.I was filled with fear and was taken back for a while.I had not been drinking at all.Since this occured i have felt uneased and always look up.
content.summary: Stationary over a neiborhood with blue beam with silent thrusters

content.detailedDescription: I was up early christmas morning going for a walk. i heard a kind of pulsating hum. i looked up and saw a spherical object in the sky at about 2,000 feet? at first i thought it was an helicopter, but it just stayed there for at least 2 minutes ( i timed it after about 15 seconds becuase it was so unusual) and then it just flew straight up and out of sight in about 3 seconds.
content.summary: An object appeared in the sky - hovered for about 2 1/2 minutes  and left.

content.detailedDescription:
Was sitting in my car after my baseball game and starting watching other games in process.  my sunroof was open and i was just relaxing.  i felt this presence and looked up.  what i noticed was a triangular dark shaped object slowly cruisng the sky approx. 10 miles per hour over the ball fields.  maybe a 1/2 mile or so up, the size is hard to determine, but guessing about 30 or 50 feet long at longest width span 30 feet or so. as it crusied in a straight line it seemed to be showing off ( as if telling me watch this ) as it made an unbelievable manuever an l shape turn without stopping or slowing down.  as if you were to grab a pencil and draw a vertical line and the end, draw a horizontal line.  an impossible manuever you cant even make with a hand motion.  within minutes i heard this helicopter come within range, it seemed military but couldn't spot it.  the ufo disappeared and so did the helicopter, the incident lasted about 3 or 4 minutes.  another incident occurred when i was driving down a main street in my town.  off to the left of my peripheral vision i noticed the stadium lights had just come on ( aboiut 4 or 5 blocks away ).  as i went forth, an orange glow came beaming down from the sky towards the stadium lights, it suddenly came to a halt, then shot back.  an impressive sight but one that makes you ponder what the hell they want ?

my theory - they couldn't determine the source quick enough and came down to investigate ?  the enourmous surge of energy tricked them and maybe blinded their sensors momentarily ( which means they are fallible )and they hurried down for some reason ?  or they are monitoring our planet for invasion ?  is it for protection or malicious purpose ?

the key question is why does our government keep us blind, with the people all infomred, we could learn so much more.  what devious deceiving ideology do they possess that makes them lie to us ?
content.summary: Triangular shape object cruising approx 10 miles per hour over ball fields

content.detailedDescription:
I worked at the cedar rapids iowa airport i loaded and unloaded baggage and we also taxied planes to and from the hanger.Also to the runway where they then took off.One day we were walking back after taxying a plane out.It had just thunderstormed.The rain had stopped but there was bright sunlight along with clouds so i was looking up as i walked back enjoying the great view of sun hitting the clouds and a rainbow.Then out of nowhere i see the sunlight hit an object very high right above the airport.I was halfway between the runway and our building on the south side of the runway.It was very metallic pure silver the sunlight was very bright agianst it.This thin was doing unbelievable manuvers going from one end of the sky to the next then immediatly turning around like stopped on a dime and turned around.I knew this think was a ufo i am former military i know what out planes our capable of doing and they could not even come close to these manuvers.I look for about 10 minutes as i watched this thing i knew it was not a trick of light because it came lower and then went higher.They delayed a plane from touching down from this thing although they never said that we knew.The next plane was do in 10 minutes for us to turn around.It was told to us that it was delayed no reason was given but we knew why.Then the thing vanished as fast as it appeared.I dont know what it was i do know that we have no technology capable of this kind of manuvering so my personal opinion is it was a ufo. i have seen one other one in my life and have serval witness's to that one also. i lived in vernal utah for about 2 years when i was 12 and 13.Well there is an air force base there curiosly though as an adult i looked and there is no reference to it on military or civilian maps and is not registered as a base.But it is there none the less i ashure you the airmen use to drive by my house on the outskirts of town on there way to the base always waving at me and me waving back.If you took the road i lived on to where it ended it ended at the base and a guarded gate.We as kids would ride up the road to the gate and say hi to the guards who would give us candy sometimes or soda pop.Anyways one night around 1987 we were on my grandmas porch and saw 3 bright lights one on top of each other just hovering.They sat there for over a half hour they would blink dissapear and reappear.Right on top of each other 1 2 3 no sound what so ever they were so close i thought i could shoot one with my 22cal gun which dad promptly took from me and said no.Then the top one blinked dissapeared reappeared and shot straight up i mean straight up so fast that it left a streak of light as it did this.The second one did the same thing about a minute later.Then the third on dissappeared then reappeared and dropped something another light fell from the bottom of this object towards the ground and then it too shot straight up.The next day me and my dad went out in to the hills where we had seen these things.We were denied access there was a big fence that ran for miles that said goverment propety it was on the air force base.So we never found out what it was.

thank you 
tim jacobson
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was working at the cedar rapids airport

content.detailedDescription:
while camping with opportunity farm a group home that i grew up at. and at an odd fellows camp. i and bob froding, and possibly tim fehan were pestering milton chapman. we had basically stolen his clothes and collapsed his tent. as he emerged from the tent. he said something like "no wait hold on listen" i hear a deep sound. as we stopped and listened we all heard the very deep sound. just as we all heard the sound milton said "look" gesturing with his hand for us to look out over the water. when i looked i became scared and excited as i saw what was making the sound. i saw an sphere sort of rounded with a roundish belly and a typical dome but a bit larger. around the object were three light colors how many lights i'm not sure but certainly 3 colors one a yellow another a sort of red and the third was sort of a cross between blue and green. about as quick as we saw and heard this craft it disappeared in a blur straight up. i was all hyped up being about 15 years of age. i picked up a stick as though i was ready to face the threat. i did not rest for some time i kept looking and looking for another view of it somewhere. ultimately i did see the craft again way up beyond the clouds, and what i saw this time intrigued me even more than the close encounter. i saw the craft project a powerful light, and then in an extremely controlled fashion take the light back in. it didn't dim as it projected and it didn't dim as it was brought back in. the light was under absolute control, as though it would be wasted if it were not collected back into the craft.
   i have only talked about this to people, and have never reported it in this fashion before. i know that bob has denied seeing it in the past. i'm not sure if milton would admit seeing it. my pastor say's he believes it was of demonic origin, the supperintendant of opportunity farm whom i told of this the next day thinks it must be something the military is doing. i don't know. but the sound, speed of departure, and incredible control of it's light source, have intrigued me all of my life. i was young, had no camera or recorder and thus only have mental images of these events. it's to bad science didn't have the ability to retrieve this imagery from my mind. i think most people would be stunned as i was. when someone asks me if i believe in ufo's i tell my story. i don't know if it is was terrestrial or extra terrestrial all i know is that the technology to produce what i witnessed does not appear to be possible even to this day. 
        thanks;
               andrew
content.summary: Sphere 3 light colors deep deep sound

content.detailedDescription:
Circular balls that moved very quickly in a triangular patteren. this was sometime ago and i am wondering if you have any other sightings of this nature around this time period above the golden colorado area.
we were outside the front of our house. there were my wife, and three of our children who saw this. we saw it several days in a row. we have always wondered. we do not know what it was just that it was not anything that any of us have ever seen before or since.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Circular ball west of arvada north of golden co. moving quickly, appering for ten minutes or so three days in a row slighlly orange in color

content.detailedDescription:
I had gone out to visit an auto grave yard. i was about 12 years old, i liked to collect the keys which were ussually found in the ignitions.  during the day it was difficult to "sneek" in and arround the "junk" yard.
i crossed an old train bridge over the river to get there. i was getting out of an old car when i noticed lights which i immeadiately assumed were shinning from a distance because the river and a sharp decline to the river were in that direction. as i looked back again within secounds realizing what i was seeing could not be there.  i then noticed the lights were moving together and were within minutes of passing directly over head orat least close to me becuase they were headed in my direction. i began to try and figure out what this thing was. i thought maybe its one of those blimps but it was more round not long.  i thought maybe it was a helocopter.  but i realized there was no sound. as it got closer i began to feel fearful of it. i only had time enough to duck behind the rear fender of the old car. it was i felt, looking at the junk yard of cars. i felt that becuase it moved closer and i feared it might see me. it was only about one hundred feet from me now and it was at about 10 feet higher than eye level.  there was a sharp embankment which led to the river below and it was riding the ridge. agian when i first noticed it, it was a bit further away from he ridge and was apparently originally following the shore line of the river. but it did come closer and as i said, i presumed it was coming close to look at the junk yard of cars.
after it moved ever so slowly passed me, it changed it's course and drifted down and above the river it was headed north and was now passing within about ten feet or so above the car bridge which was parallel to the train bridge.  i was now able to see it more clearly even thought it was now many hundreds of feet from me. the lights which light up the car bridge allowed me to make out the shape more definately.  as it passed earlier it was so black of a night and the back ground was as dark and so close it was difficult to know for sure what shape it actually was . now as it became back lit i was able to see all of its shape.  also at that momment which it was passing the bridge a car was driving across the bridge and i then knew for sure that unless the driver was blind he had to have seen it.  i would estimate and did at that time estimate it was large enought to hold inside of it two of those cars. and so it was fairly large but not enormous.
agian it had not one sound it moved very steadly and it seemed to be able to adjust speed and manuver> the lights dimed after it passed me and the junk yard and they brighted again when it passed over the bridge. further the lights seemed to flicker and indipendently of each other brighten and dim when they had been near the junk yard. i told no one about this becuase i was not supposed to be out at night as i had been and i decided  wait to hear about it maybe from the news or maybe from someone saying it was seen. i also felt i would be teased and not believed anyways. i find it easy to believe that there was some kind of effect on me becuase of this incident but to go into that would take away from the creditabilty of this true story.  i did not imagine this happened  i lived it and it really happened.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Blackened back ground, multiple lights which were at times brighter than others appeared to be mounted or held in place by a cage like outer attachment

content.detailedDescription: Driving on a country road west of ft scott, ks.  late eve-stopped at stop sign-this big thing ( it was so bright i couldn`t see the shape)  with blinding lights stopped in front of us about 30 ft. in the air -it hovered there for a few seconds, for a bit i couldn`t do anything-i seemed frozen. and then just went up in the air and was gone in a split second. it made no sound.  i was so scared, my 12 year old daughter was sreaming  for me to go home-i turned the truck around and headed home as fast as we could go. there was also a white pickup that pulled up to the intersection at the same time but they didn`t stop-just threw gravel and drove like crazy to get out of there. when i got home and walked in the door-my husband said i was white as a sheet.  very few people know about this-but i still get chills thinking sbout it.
content.summary: Lights so bright they almost blinded us-stood still about 50 ft in sky

content.detailedDescription:
At the intersection of 119th and andreson blvd. my witness and i experienced a house size crop circle with two attached smaller circles, which was across the street from the chevron, facing west.

my high school friends son and i were placing garage sale sale signs on foot in that intersection, and easily noticed a perfect circle in the tall grass feild next to the road which was smashed perfectly down to the ground.  

i believe it was a crop circle and so does he.  

we naturally reported it to our families and friends, but this is my first public anouncement of it.

i felt excited and reved up about it along with all the other strange extraterrestrial and paranormal happenings that happened to me that year.
content.summary: Crop circle

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of 12-23-2007 at 7:45 pm i went outside to feed our outside cat. the moon was full and very bright with a few passing clouds moving from as i stand facing in a north east position right to left. as i gazed up at the moon and what stars were visible because of the brightness of the moon. i observed while looking at the moon a bright object bouncing and jurking in the 8:00 position of the moon. i rushed in the house and got my meade dsx-102at telescope. this aroused my family when i told them what i was watching outside.The temp. outside was 40 or so but there were six of us watching this bright object dance around and jurk side to side. while observing it through the telescope we all observed it changing from egg to oval then oblong shape spinning.After several hours the object moved from the 8:00 to the 2:00 position of the moon. the lens on my telescope was fogging up so i had to call it a night. needless to say the next night when i went out the objct was gone. i'm very sure that there were others that saw this so i would like to read someone's report to see what they saw.
content.summary: Bright  object  circling  the  moon

content.detailedDescription: Why don't you stay off of this site. if you're not interested in ufo's what is the point. my guess is that you are a pre-pubescent punk who has nothing better to do. although you did visit mufon which tells me that you have some interest in ufo's, otherwise you would have posted your crap somewhere else. people like you screw it up for everyone else ! loser !
content.summary: Re: wings, loud, very large with blinking lights, particularly sexy

content.detailedDescription: We were setting up a pre-christmas party with my relatives, i went outside to talk with my brother, when an airplane came over. i couldn't read what it said on it, so i assumed it was full of aliens.
content.summary: Wings, loud, very large with blinking lights, particularly sexy

content.detailedDescription: It happened on december 22nd, 2007. it was a little past midnight. i was coming out of my bathroom in my apartment, and something caught my eye outside as i glanced through my bedroom window. i noticed the sky was illuminated with a red light. something round, and bright red was hovering in the sky. it was the same brightness and color as a flare that was lit up in the sky, but it definently had no smoke trail behind it, and it didn't sound off the way a flare would. distancially, i'd say it was about a quarter of a football field away. it was close. it had no sound at all, so i knew for a fact it wasn't a jet, airplane, or helicopter. even if it were a plane or helicopter, it wouldn't have been able to hover that close to the ground, there are so many houses. plus, like i said, there was absolutely no noise. it was in the middle of the night, no cars were out, everyone was asleep. the object looked as though it was landing, or something. i couldn't really make out any other special features about it's appearance, other than it giving off a very bright luminous red light. i seen it clear in the dark sky, and i watched it for about 20 seconds before it descended down behind the trees. it looked as if it had landed somewhere in the woods. it was a very strange experience; i was surprised, and excited at the same time. i knew it was a ufo. it couldn't be anything else. i've never seen anything like it in my whole life.
content.summary: Bright red light

content.detailedDescription:
It was december 11 arond 11pm. i looked out my large livingroom window and noticed that the skies above slc were clearning. i could see the
night sky for the first time since a major storm moved though.
i noticed a bleep of white and
blue light and thought to myself the storms are gone, the small planes are out! then i noticed the "small plane" wasn't moving.

i grabbed my camcorder and sat on the floor and followed the object off and on for about 40 minutes. the object was moving farther to the south and higher in the sky. 

mybest footage is when i first started to video the object. beyond that the object is too far away to view detail. i didn't realize what i had on video until reviewing it. 

this was a disk shapped object with a small dome on the top. it moved very quickly when it pulsed  a burst of white light.  the footage i have should be viewed and available to the public. i have never seen a closer view or clearer view. please assist me in who to contact and how to get this out there!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I have detailed footage of disk object in digital video. it's brief, however distinct. this object was in the sky for over 40 minutues moving from se to the south

content.detailedDescription: I own a brick home with a metal roof.  around 11pm december 17th, 2007, i heard something on my roof.  it was 2 thuds, then 2 more thuds followed.  my roof has a very steep pitch and i was wondering what could have landed on it without sliding off.  my 2 dogs are in the backyard and the youngest dog barked once.  the older dog which barks all the time never barked at all, which is very strange.  then i heard the dogs make a weird noise i have never heard before.  it was like a combination of a whine and a howl, then silence.  i kept listening, very alert, trying to figure out what was going on.  i looked towards the window. the curtain i close every night was open about an inch and a half, which i know i had closed all the way earlier.  as i lie there looking at the curtain i started getting very sleepy and that was it.  i didn't remember anything until later the next evening when i decided to take a soaking bath instead of a shower like i usually do.  i was in the tub and felt a burning sensation on my left knee.  i looked down and there was a pyramid shaped red mark that looks like a burn on my knee.  it measures 2" at the bottom and the sides measure 1 1/2". the edges are straight and well defined.   my daughter took a photo of it.  a week later the mark is still there.
content.summary: Pyramid shape burn on knee

content.detailedDescription: Like in our last reporting, we basically saw a bright object in the sky that moved unlike anything we've ever seen. it spiraled, zig-zagged, went up and down, and pulsated in all sorts of colors. we've been to plane and helecopter shows, and this thing did not move like our aircraft. it is very fluid and graceful. the only thing different about this time is that we pulled out the telescope to get a better look at this object, but were shocked to find that it appeared as nothing more than a bright, colorful dot. the first time we saw this thing we assumed it was about 2 miles away from our position, but through a telescope that could show every detail of our moon it looked like a star or a distant planet. i thought that something was wrong with the telescope, but at the same time we don't really know how big this thing is or if it's as far away as we think, or if it really could be a star or planet. needless to say, this will be on our minds for a while.

Looked out my window to look at a shimmering star, when i saw lights white and red maybe blue also, huvering slowly towards the right, i picked up my binoculars to get a better look at it, i couldnt get it with the binocs, when i put them down i was startled as it was now moving towards me, it was moving too slowly and had turned too sharp for a plane, i saw its lights as it flew over me, much faster, so as must have accelerated, but i missed the acceleration trying to see it with binoculars, the lights were in an arc maybe a circle, this was no helicopter, as it flew over it made a loud loud humming, with a less loud jet noise. arc of lights maybe a circle as it flew over and revealed its rear light. actualy larger then a golf ball at arms length. feeling of a powerful gravity craft was my feeling of it. ps it is now an hour later as i type this at 12:25, and that shimmering lstar, wich has been moving all over the sky over time, is still moving about and shimmering, possibly a satelite i suppose. note first observed south-west-south, last ovserved vertical.
content.summary: Arc of lights, golf ball at arms length.

content.detailedDescription:
My then boyfriend at the time pulled over when i saw a weird light in a farm field by the prison. it wasn't a tractor, plane or anything like that. it just sat there but was way too bright. and it was very dark out. i was really scared and didn't want him to get out of the car. he did. i didn't. but i watched him walk through the field. all i could stare at was the bright light. 

the next thing i knew he was back in the car but it was much later and we were arguing over how mud got in the car. the light was gone and i asked him about it but he didn't remember it. i just wanted out of there, so we left. when we went to pick up my kids we'd lost 3 hours and his mother was worried sick.
content.summary: Stopped by side of road at weird light lost time

content.detailedDescription:
It was 1992 about 6 0r 7 pm in the summertime, i had the doors and windows open.  i was washing dishes.  my boyfriend had drove to the mini mart about 2 blocks away.  we had been arguing, so when i heard him yelling for me from the front of the house i ingnored him.   after he called out for me 3 times to come and see something, i turned to see his car stopped in the middle of the street at an angle with the door still open.  i had a longtime family friend there with me and being stubborn,i asked her to go see what he wanted. a few seconds later she called for me too saying "look come see. what is that?"

    reluctently, i walked calmley outside to see what looked like a black cone-disc shaped object with 3 prong-like legs decending up into the sky. it was moving up slowly, i could see faint orange-yellow fire under. looked blurry and wavey like the sun looks hot. i couldnt determine how big it was or how far away, so i asked my boyfriend and he said it was about as big as 1 car and tall as 2 cars. he said when he came down the street turned left it was about a 1/2 block in front of him hovering over the street just above the cars. he then said he looked around to see who was doing this and how but no one was around.  he said it never made a sound then just started going straight up not fast not slow. he had to turn right before getting to the location where he first saw it and  1/2 block down to get to our house. thats when he stopped in the middle of the street and called out for me.  it took about 15 mins before it disapeared.

     i didnt have a clue what it was.  i was shocked to hear it was so close to the street and was surpprised nobody else was outside at that time.  i live in a busy suburb about three 20 miles from l.A. and it was summer evening but yet no one walking or outside.  i wonder if anyone else saw it.  i wish i had been more curious at the time and asked nieghbors of called someone.

    ive looked at thousands of ufo pics and cant find one like it.  i did see a program on the travel channel that was showing wierd things or places and it show a picture of the us military at some air force landing site with two military men standing in front of a craft ready to take off ready to take off it was the same color, size, shape and had fire under it.  it had serial numbers or codes on the side in white.  i wish i find out where and when and what it was or find the picture.
content.summary: Saw it decending up into the from the street it had fire or heat under  it

content.detailedDescription: At 9:15 p.M. the witness was at home when a neighbor pounded on the door yelling that there were ufos overhead.  the witness grabbed her binoculars and ran out to see two objects, both round and red on the bottom but blue and white in the body.  both were emitting what appeared to be strobes of light which were crooked like lighting.  the objects moved in whirling, zig-zagging, and s movements as they advanced very slowly toward the west northwest. the smaller of the two objects, which seemed to be farther away, appeared to be over the intercoastal waterway.  after 45 minutes, the objects were covered by clouds and were not visible to the witnesses.
content.summary: Two ufos emitting bursts of  light

content.detailedDescription: I was stationed at a p.A.T.S. (personnel awaiting technical school) at lackland air force base. an airman who majored in physics and i were discussing science as we lay on the asphalt exercise field to avoid being in the hot, humid, un-airconditioned barracks. as we looked at the clear, dark sky he said, " hey look at that over there ! there was a silver, round light moving fast and high going from east to west. i thought it was the belly light of a jet. i wondered why there were no red and green lights, but i said, damn! that jet is going really high and fast! i scanned the sky and said, "look, there's another one just like it !  ( (coming from east to west)  it looks like there going to crash into each other! they almost hit, but at the last moment made a sharp right-angle south. i exclaimed, " we can't do that ! do you know what we are looking at?  these are ufos!" (meaning et crafts) they made a plowing pattern by going straight and opposite of each other.  then they did 180 degree turns to start a new lines. i said, " it looks like they're scanning our base!"  as they accelerated through the turns they flared larger and brighter to about 5 times the original diameter...Which was like the head of a straight-pin at arms length. after,i guess, 8 to 10 repetitions, they accelerated in opposite directions as they brilliantly flared, then totally disappeared. there was no contrail.  we waited for 5 minutes,but head no jet sound. it was all done in silence. it took my breath away!  it was an epiphany. i asked," do you want to report this?"  my friend said, "no, we are going for our secret (electronics) clearance ,  and we won't get it if we talk about little green men." i agreed.  we kept our mouths shut. this event forever changed my perspective on the universe and what our science knows. after searching the skies for 38 years since, i have seen nothing esle like it.  my hobby after this became studying unknown mysteries and scientific controversy.
content.summary: 2 bright white lights  made scanning pattern  over usaf base. right angle turns + other strange behavior.

content.detailedDescription:
My late husband and i witnessed this event in august of 2004.  i didn't report this to anyone because the sighting left us in a state of amazement/disbelief/awe for quite some time.  the only real discussion my husband and i had about it was to compare notes the next day to confirm that we had each seen the same thing and that neither of us had dreamt it.  up until his death a year ago my husband wouldn't talk about the sighting with me.  the whole experience seemed to really shock him.  i finally decided that i should tell someone about our sighting.  i reported this to tom levine's site earlier in the year and decided that mufon should also know about it.
 
it happened on the 22nd of august, 2004, around 1 am.  we live in hague, saskatchewan, a town of 700 located about 1/2 hour north of saskatoon.  it was our habit during the summer to sit on our veranda and watch the night sky.  that particular night the sky was clear.  we were sitting facing east.  my husband noticed an orange light moving towards us in the sky and pointed it out to me.  within a minute of this the sky was totally obliterated by an enormous black triangular shape that had a light at each corner.  it moved very slowly from east to west and passed directly over our house.  it made absolutely no sound and seemed to be travelling at a very low altitude although this was rather hard to judge because of the enormous size of the object.  when it was directly overhead it blocked out most of the sky.  it appeared to be very close to the roof of our 2 1/2 storey house.  we sat in stunned silence and watched as it passed overhead.  we lost sight of it when it passed over the house.  the only comment that we made to each other at the time was "what the hell was that".  as i said previously we compared notes the next day to confirm that we had seen the same thing and my husband was loath to discuss it after that.
content.summary: Huge black triangle flew slowly and silently over the house

content.detailedDescription: I frequently browse the faa weather cams for southeast alaska. i also like to check out the loops and will look at every picture in the loops just to see what i can see. the two small objects caught my attention immediately for some reason. after saving the image to my pictures and zooming up on the images, (especially the lower, closer one), i was flabbergasted to realize what i was seeing did not appear to be birds, choppers, planes or anything i usually observe. i thought even though it looked like a disc i would take some pictures of birds to compare. i was lucky to have an eagle circling right in front of the house about 1/8 to 1/4 mile away so i took several shots of it and compared them to the disc objects. there was no similarity at all. the objects flying over the wrangell airport are not birds. the lower closer one even appears to be metallic in that on the lower right hand side it appears to be reflecting light. i know you guys can enhance an image way better than me. even when i zoom way up on the images where they blur out, they retain their disc shape. so please enhance these images and e-mail me the results.
content.summary: Faa webcam image

content.detailedDescription:
I was sleeping in the downstairs guestroom of our farmhouse since my husband was sick in our bedroom upstairs. in a partial sleep, i heard my husband clearly call my name. i quickly got out of bed and went up to check on him but he was fine and sound asleep. i came back down and as i got back into bed i saw a flashing light in the corner of the guestroom window. at first i thought it was lightning but i knew i hadn't heard any thunder and that a storm was not expected. i went to the window and pulled back the shade and stood in front of it and in the rear pasture (about 500 feet away) i saw very large flashing white lights (perhaps 4 to 6 to 8) and it seemed there were smaller lights that were trajected out from the larger lights that were flashing at a faster rate.  (from looking at photos on the internet of ufo sitings, it may been not flashing lights but a craft turning fast -- though they appeared to be flashing.)there was no sound at all. it seemed to be a craft but i couldn't see a craft -- only lights --if the lights were attached to something, it seems that the craft should have been round. i guess my first thought was that it was a helicopter but i soon knew this couldn't be the case as it was much too large and didn't make any sound at all. it moved across the pasture and closer to the house and at the end of the pasture (about 300 feet away) it appeared to come down and to try to land. it was only at this point i became frightened.  but then it quickly raised up into the air again and went off behind the house where i couldn't see it any longer. the smaller flashing faster lights continued to be on the side of the house where my window was for another 8 to 10 seconds at least. i went to the back of the house but by the time i arrived there, i could see no more lights and was too scared to go outside. the next day i went out to the pasture but saw no evidence of anything that was visible from a landing or an attempted landing. my impression was that it wanted to land, somehow detected me, and then decided not to land. perhaps an electrical or energy field that it created by being so close is what made me hear my husband's voice wake me up. it was clearly not my husband who was fast asleep upstairs and i still don't know why i woke up.  

this has affected my life as i now know that "they" are out there, but the feeling i have is positive and not negative. i didn't contact authorities in the area as it is rural and no one wants the local authorities to think they might be crazy. i've not been able to find any reported sightings in this area on that day other than a possible one in canada and a possible one in connecticut, but nothing nearby. and i 've not been able yet to find a description of a ufo siting that sounds like what i saw. there are not that many sitings in this area of upstate new york anyway.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw lights -- two sets -- one very large (4 to 6) others smaller and flashing faster.  attempted to alight but then didn't.
